mapper.select: select id as id, name as name, picAddress as picAddress, status as status, remarks as remarks from wx_banner where id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into wx_banner( id, name, picAddress, status, remarks ) values ( #{id}, #{name}, #{picAddress}, #{status}, #{remarks} )
mapper.update: update wx_banner set name = #{name}, picAddress = #{picAddress}, status = #{status}, remarks = #{remarks}, where id = #{id}
